entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, 0.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 11:02 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: 0.0°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: E 21 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets this afternoon then to rain showers later this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
